steps.name: step1
steps.summary: Tombstones - Shoot the tombstones in the correct order.
notes: Sequence is 2-3-1-4, representing each character's death.
Reset by starting from Richtofen's tombstone if the sequence is incorrect.
Listen for the thunder sound as confirmation of completion.

steps.name: getApothiconServant
steps.summary: Obtain the Apothicon Servant from the Mystery Box.
notes: May require multiple Mystery Box uses. Plan for potential high expense.
Crucial for several Easter Egg steps, especially for dealing with zombies.

steps.name: audioReel1
steps.summary: Collect the first Audio Reel after completing the tombstone step.
notes: The Keeper Protector needs to chant for three minutes at a specific Jump Pad.
Protect the Keeper Protector from zombies during the ritual.
The first Audio Reel appears near the Jump Pad after the ritual.

steps.name: audioReel2
steps.summary: Obtain the second Audio Reel by using Li'l Arnies in the Apothicon.
notes: Throw Li'l Arnies into holes within the Apothicon to summon Margwas.
Each set of three holes used spawns a different type of Margwa.
The second Audio Reel spawns after defeating all summoned Margwas.

steps.name: audioReel3
steps.summary: Collect the third Audio Reel by gathering skeleton parts around the map.
notes: Shoot specific rocks with a Pack-a-Punched weapon to reveal skeleton parts.
Use the upgraded Apothicon Servant to collect the parts.
The third Audio Reel appears after collecting all skeleton parts.

steps.name: step3
steps.summary: Materializing S.O.P.H.I.A - Use turrets at the Corruption Engines to shoot four floating blue 115 rocks.
notes: Each turret activation costs 2000 points. Plan your finances.
Shoot the left-side rock from each turret's perspective towards Nacht der Untoten.
S.O.P.H.I.A becomes fully visible after all four rocks are hit.

steps.name: step4
steps.summary: Obtaining the Kronorium - Teleport to Samantha's bedroom and pick up the Kronorium.
notes: All players must be in the teleporter to initiate the teleport.
Kronorium is placed on the podium in Kino der Toten upon return.
This step is crucial for narrative progression.

steps.name: step5
steps.summary: Acquiring the Apothicon Eggs - Find and fill Apothicon Eggs with zombie souls.
notes: Eggs are spread across the map. Each has multiple spawn points.
Killing zombies near the Eggs will fill them up.
Filled Eggs turn into Gateworms, needed for later steps.

steps.name: step6
steps.summary: Retrieving the Runes of Creation - Use the Gateworms to find Runes of Creation.
notes: Listen for the beeping noise to find the Runes' invisible spawn points.
Gateworms are used to reveal and collect the Runes of Creation.
The beeping gets faster as you approach the correct location.

steps.name: step7
steps.summary: Recovering the Summoning Key - Complete the challenges in the boss arena.
notes: Prepare for intense combatâ€”bring powerful weapons and ammo.
The Helmet of the King provides extra protection against enemies.
Completing the symbol sequence correctly is crucial to progress.

steps.name: step8
steps.summary: Gathering the Objects - Throw the Summoning Key at several items related to previous Easter Eggs.
notes: Be cautious of the Summoning Key's glitches; follow suggested precautions.
Each successful hit is indicated by an audio cue and visual effect.
Collecting all objects progresses the Easter Egg towards the final battle.

steps.name: step9
steps.summary: Defeating the Shadowman - Final battle against the Shadowman.
notes: Use the charged Summoning Key on S.O.P.H.I.A to break the Shadowman's shield.
Concentrate fire on the Shadowman when his shield is down.
Success unlocks significant rewards and concludes the Easter Egg.

steps.name: upgradeApothiconServant
steps.summary: Upgrade the Apothicon Servant via the Pack-a-Punch.
notes: The upgrade enhances its effectiveness significantly.
Necessary for completing specific Easter Egg steps.

steps.name: getLilArnies
steps.summary: Obtain the Li'l Arnies from the Mystery Box.
notes: Useful for distracting zombies and managing large groups.
Required for collecting the second Audio Reel.

steps.name: getHelmetOfTheKing
steps.summary: Obtain the Helmet of the King for extra protection.
notes: Provides a significant defensive boost.
Highly recommended for surviving in later steps.
